entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023
